content:
Reason: "All streams" heading in the left-sidebar cause discrepancy for the user, as it is unable to express if it is heading for the current column as "Streams" is in the previous column or is it texts descriptions for the back icon.
Possible options to rename can be :
"BACK TO STREAMS" as suggested by @Tim Abbott
Other suggestions are welcome.
Check https://github.com/zulip/zulip/pull/18048 for reference.
Yeah, "back to streams" should be fine here.

Great, merged. I think we also should have different styling for that widget than the all-caps styling that must be inherited from the STREAMS label (since they share a visual position). I don't have a specific proposal, though.
